org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting
Class SmoothTilePainter.Tile

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.travelingsalesman.painting.SmoothTilePainter.Tile
Enclosing class:
SmoothTilePainter
protected class SmoothTilePainter.Tile
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a wrapper for a SlippyMap-Tile. It contains the image and coordinates of a pre-rendered map-part.

Author:
Marcus Wolschon

SmoothTilePainter.Tile

public SmoothTilePainter.Tile(double lat,
                              double lon,
                              int zoom,
                              boolean allowIllegalCoords)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Create a new tile of the given location and zoom-level.

Parameters:
lat - the location
lon - the location
zoom - the zoom-level
allowIllegalCoords - if true no exception will be raised. However illegal tiles cannot be rendered without an exception.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if javax.imageio has a problem

SmoothTilePainter.Tile

public SmoothTilePainter.Tile(int xTile,
                              int yTile,
                              int zoom,
                              boolean allowIllegalCoords)
                       throws java.io.IOException
Create a new tile of the given location and zoom-level.

Parameters:
xTile - the horizontal tile-number
yTile - the horizontal tile-number
zoom - the zoom-level
allowIllegalCoords - if true no exception will be raised. However illegal tiles cannot be rendered without an exception.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if javax.imageio has a problem
